channel.title: How i do with bluurrs ppl only can connect
channel.description:
hi
and. how i do then that ppl only canc onnect to me server???? with bluurrs client.??
i need the client to btw

item.title: How i do with bluurrs ppl only can connect
item.dc:creator: @noobofiyer noobofiyer
item.description:
@noobofiyer wrote:

yes idk how.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 10:18:55 am[/size][hr]o so i search that wat u sad then i do some spaces??? and that that other under it? and save compile?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 10:25:33 am[/size][hr][quote="_, post:5, topic:287666"]Or, search ‘returnCode = 3;’ and around there, put this: (of course you fill in the blanks)

if(UID != #that of bluurrs#) returnCode = #something#;[/quote]

so i search that

do some spaces

and put that other under it and ppl can connect to me server without using at tab thing on bluurrs?

Read full topic

item.title: How i do with bluurrs ppl only can connect
item.dc:creator: @sng sng
item.description:
@sng wrote:

Well I found the IP thing just open Bluur and go to one of the top tabs its there. But when I log in it just logs out. WTF?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 10:09:01 am[/size][hr]

item.source: How i do with bluurrs ppl only can connect

item.title: How i do with bluurrs ppl only can connect
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

[quote="_™, post:5, topic:287666"]Or, search ‘returnCode = 3;’ and around there, put this: (of course you fill in the blanks)

if(UID != #that of bluurrs#) returnCode = #something#;[/quote]

That makes it so only Bluurr’s client can connect to your server.

Read full topic

dl there[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 09:53:30 am[/size][hr]My question is: how i change ip on bluurrs client to mine so they can Straighly connect to me server if the client is loaded.[/quote]

Uhh ohh… can not find the ip 127.0.0.1 ANYWHERE… this is bad…

item.title: How i do with bluurrs ppl only can connect
item.dc:creator: @sng sng
item.description:
@sng wrote:

Go to client.java. Hit Control + H, and search 127.0.0.1, and replace it with your server ID.
